000000000000000000000000000000000000000000e
00000000000000000000KICK000000000000000000e
0000000000000000OFr'      1H00000000000000e
0000000000000hl:            :+o#0000000000e
000000000Xf;      010100001     :lh0000000e
0000000i-     _iP0000000000Kx:      !00000e
0000000,     fD000Oof     0000I:     K0000e
0000000,    X000K!                   K0000e
0000000,   f000E-           xx   xx  K0000e
0000000,   o000f          oxxxx oxxx K0000e

0000000,    k000X~                   K0000e

000000000000000000000000000000000000000000e

### *filtra_num_space.cpp* ###

Objetivos:

    Usar rotina básica para não aceitar espaços em branco
    e/ou números na entrada de dados do usuário.
